document_data.caption: A map of the Pirate Isles showing Telfar in the south.
document_data.name: Telfar
document_data.mainbody: '''Telfar''' was a small island in the southern [[Pirate Isles]] on the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]].
document_data.Geography: Telfaran was found just south of [[Mirg Isle]] and north of [[Sarr]].
document_data.Description: Telfar's excellent natural harbor made it a popular resting point for pirates returning from the open sea laden with treasure.
document_data.Inhabitants: The threat of storms left Telfar uninhabited aside from temporary visitors.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Pirates familiar with the area usually avoided Telfar on nights where a full moon rose as entire ships were known to disappear here. Many speculated about the sinister causes of these disappearances, ranging from [[lycanthrope]]s to giant sea monsters, but the truth was a purely scientific one. The natural shape of Telfar's harbor caused water to rush out during the tidal change of the full moon, creating a large whirlpool capable of engulfing any nearby ships.
